A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In my opinion\, the director should have seen the previous movie\, ya know\, to understand the personalities of the characters that he inherited. Sure\, Poe is a damn good pilot\, but he is not some loose cannon that would cause a mutiny of all things. Luke dies\, but Leia lives? Hello jackass! Carrie is dead! \n\nTo some it up: I thought the Force Awakens was bad\, until this abomination. Screwed the pooch!
